name: Teaching Assistant - Uniandes
title: Teacher Assistant at Uniandes - Object-Oriented Programming and Algorithms
description: The objective of the course is to introduce students to basic of programming, using Java as programming languaje. As a teaching assistant, I graded the practical tests and aided the students in the practical sessions.

name: SoftCore LM32
title: Documentation and Implementation of SoftCore LM32 in a FPGA
description: As the final project in the major of Electronical Engineering, the Soft-Processor LatticeMico 32 was implemented on a Quartus FPGA. Additionally, all its functionalities and characteristics were documented, as well as a couple of start tutorials.
